Borsalino.name: Kizaru
Borsalino.Description: Kizaru, also known as Borsalino, is a Marine Admiral and the last remaining member of the original Admiral trio. Known for his significant role in major arcs, he serves as a key antagonist in the Sabaody, Marineford, and Egghead arcs
Borsalino.Appearance: Light brown skin, short black hair, and a goatee. He wears a white Marine coat with a blue shirt and pants, and sunglasses.
Borsalino.Personality: Calm, laid-back, and indifferent. He often speaks in a casual manner and has a nonchalant attitude towards serious situations.

Abilities.Light Speed Movement: Kizaru can move at the speed of light, allowing him to travel vast distances almost instantaneously.
Abilities.Light Manipulation: He can create and control light, using it to attack or defend.
Abilities.Intangibility: As a Logia user, Kizaru can become intangible, allowing attacks to pass through him.

Issho.name: Fujitora
Issho.Description: Fujitora, also known as Issho, is a Marine Admiral appointed through the World Military Draft during the two-year timeskip. Formerly a guard captain, he is known for his belief in Humane Justice and led the movement to abolish the Warlord system. He played a key role in the Dressrosa Arc, where he appeared as a secondary antagonist.
Issho.Appearance: Fujitora is a blind man with only the whites of his eyes showing, though he usually keeps both eyes closed. He has an X-shaped scar centered on the left side of his forehead that stretches over both eyes, which was actually self-inflicted due to his decision to blind himself. He has short, spiky black hair and a beard. He wears a purple coat with a high collar, a white shirt, and dark pants. He also carries a cane sword.
Issho.Personality: Fujitora is a virtuous and benevolent man who puts great emphasis on doing the right thing while preventing misfortune for others. He detests evil to such a strong degree that he blinded himself on purpose, inflicting damage on his eyes out of sorrow for all the evil he had seen,with him stating in Dressrosa that not having sight is a blessing

Abilities.Gravity Manipulation: Fujitora can manipulate gravity, allowing him to create powerful gravitational fields, lift massive objects, and even control the movement of people and ships.
Abilities.Swordsmanship: He is a skilled swordsman, capable of using his cane sword with great proficiency.
Abilities.Observation Haki: Fujitora possesses advanced Observation Haki, allowing him to sense the presence and emotions of others.
Abilities.Armament Haki: He can use Armament Haki to enhance his attacks and defend against powerful foes.

Kuzan.name: Aokiji
Kuzan.Description: Kuzan, also known as Aokiji, is a former Marine Admiral who now serves as the captain of the Tenth Ship of the Blackbeard Pirates. Once a candidate for Fleet Admiral, he resigned after losing a duel to Sakazuki. He has played various antagonist roles throughout the series, notably in the Long Ring Long Land, Marineford, Egghead, and Final Saga arcs.
Kuzan.Occupations: Pirate; Titanic Captain (Captain of the Tenth Ship); Admiral (former); Vice Admiral (former)
Kuzan.Appearance: Kuzan is an incredibly tall, slim, yet muscular man with dark skin and a large, round head. He has short, spiky black hair and a beard. He wears a blue coat with a white shirt underneath, blue pants, and sandals. He also has a pair of sunglasses that he often wears on his forehead.
Kuzan.Personality: Calm, laid-back, and indifferent. He often speaks in a casual manner and has a nonchalant attitude towards serious situations.

Abilities.Ice Manipulation: Kuzan can create, control, and transform into ice, allowing him to freeze opponents and large areas instantly.
Abilities.Ice Age: He can freeze entire bodies of water and create massive ice structures.
Abilities.Intangibility: As a Logia user, Kuzan can become intangible, allowing attacks to pass through him.
Abilities.Observation Haki: Kuzan possesses advanced Observation Haki, allowing him to sense the presence and emotions of others.
Abilities.Armament Haki: He can use Armament Haki to enhance his attacks and defend against powerful foes.

Sakazuki.name: Akainu
Sakazuki.Description: Sakazuki, formerly known as Akainu, is the current Fleet Admiral of the Marines and a staunch enforcer of Absolute Justice. He rose to power after defeating Aokiji and relocating Marine Headquarters to the New World. Known for his extreme ideology, he serves as the main antagonist of the Marineford Arc and a major antagonist in the latter half of the series.
Sakazuki.Personality: Ruthless, uncompromising, and fiercely loyal to the Marines. He believes in absolute justice and is willing to go to any lengths to achieve it.

Abilities.Magma Manipulation: Sakazuki can create, control, and transform into magma, allowing him to melt opponents and large areas instantly.
Abilities.Magma Fist: He can create powerful magma-based attacks, such as his signature move, the Magma Fist.
Abilities.Intangibility: As a Logia user, Sakazuki can become intangible, allowing attacks to pass through him.
Abilities.Observation Haki: Sakazuki possesses advanced Observation Haki, allowing him to sense the presence and emotions of others.
Abilities.Armament Haki: He can use Armament Haki to enhance his attacks and defend against powerful foes.

Sengoku.name: Sengoku
Sengoku.Description: Sengoku the Buddha is a former Fleet Admiral of the Marines who led during the era of Gol D. Roger and the Marineford War. After the war, he stepped down and became Inspector General. A key figure in Marine history, he also acted as a mentor to Donquixote Rosinante. He serves as a major antagonist in the Marineford Arc.

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Daibutsu

Sengoku.Appearance: Sengoku is a tall, fair-skinned, and muscular man with a long, braided goatee and a mustache. He is usually seen alongside his pet goat. His cap covers his hair, which is set in a large afro. His afro was revealed after using his Devil Fruit powers and having his cap knocked off
Sengoku.Personality: Sengoku is a wise and strategic leader who values justice and the safety of the world. He is known for his calm demeanor and ability to make difficult decisions for the greater good.

Abilities.Buddha Transformation: Sengoku can transform into a giant golden Buddha, greatly enhancing his strength and durability.
Abilities.Shockwave Generation: He can create powerful shockwaves with his attacks, capable of devastating large areas.
Abilities.Haki Mastery: Sengoku is proficient in both Observation and Armament Haki, allowing him to sense opponents and enhance his attacks.
Abilities.Strategic Mind: As a former Fleet Admiral, Sengoku possesses exceptional strategic and tactical skills.

Monkey D. Garp.name: Monkey D. Garp
Monkey D. Garp.Description: Monkey D. Garp, known as Garp the Fist, is a legendary Marine Vice Admiral famed for his strength and heroic deeds, particularly during the God Valley Incident. He is the father of Dragon, grandfather of Luffy, and adoptive grandfather of Ace. Despite his status, he refused promotion to Admiral due to his disdain for the World Nobles and remains a pivotal figure in Marine history.
Monkey D. Garp.Epithet: "Garp the Fist"; Hero of the Marines (VIZ: "Naval Hero")
Monkey D. Garp.Appearance: Garp is a tall, tanned, broad-chested, muscular old man. He has a beard and a scar around his left eye, somewhat reminiscient of the scar Luffy has under his right eye. In the anime, his eye color is blue, and his hair is gray, whereas in the manga, it is white.
Monkey D. Garp.Personality: Garp is a boisterous, carefree, and humorous individual who values strength and justice. He has a strong sense of duty towards the Marines but also cares deeply for his family, often showing a softer side when it comes to Luffy and Ace.

Abilities.Haki Mastery: Garp is a master of Haki, capable of using both Observation and Armament Haki to enhance his combat abilities.
Abilities.Superhuman Strength: He possesses immense physical strength, capable of delivering devastating punches and attacks.
Abilities.Combat Experience: Garp has extensive combat experience, having fought against some of the strongest pirates in history.
Abilities.Strategic Mind: As a seasoned Marine, Garp has a keen strategic mind and is skilled in battle tactics.

Smoker.name: Smoker
Smoker.Description: Smoker the White Hunter is a Marine Vice Admiral and commander of the G-5 base. Initially stationed in Loguetown, he became determined to capture Luffy and pursued him into the Grand Line. Though once an antagonist, Smoker evolved into a complex figure, clashing with and occasionally allying with the Straw Hats throughout several arcs, including Loguetown, Marineford, Arabasta, and Punk Hazard.
Smoker.Occupations: Vice Admiral; ; Base Commander of G-5; Commander of G-5 Unit 01; Commodore (former); Captain (former)
Smoker.Epithet: "Smoker the White Hunter"; "White Chase Smoker" (VIZ); "Smoke Hunter" (4Kids)
Smoker.Appearance: Smoker is a muscular, tall man with a distinct trait of always being seen smoking two cigars at once. He has short silvery-white hair cut in a textured pompadour fade style (his hair appears pale teal in the pre-timeskip anime). He has brown eyes which sometimes appear red, such as during the Punk Hazard arc. He wears a large thick white and blue specialist marine jacket which he keeps open, with greenish fur lining the neck, wrists, and hem
Smoker.Personality: Smoker is a no-nonsense Marine who values justice and upholds the law. He is known for his strong sense of duty and determination to capture pirates, especially Luffy. Despite his stern demeanor, he has a sense of honor and respects those who fight for their beliefs.

Abilities.Smoke Manipulation: Smoker can create, control, and transform into smoke, allowing him to envelop opponents and large areas.
Abilities.Intangibility: As a Logia user, Smoker can become intangible, allowing attacks to pass through him.
Abilities.Haki Mastery: Smoker possesses advanced Observation Haki, allowing him to sense the presence and emotions of others.
Abilities.Combat Experience: He has extensive combat experience and is skilled in hand-to-hand combat.

Jaguar D. Saul.name: Jaguar D. Saul
Jaguar D. Saul.Description: Jaguar D. Saul is a giant and former Marine Vice Admiral who defected and protected Nico Robin during the Ohara Buster Call, ultimately surviving an attack by Aokiji. Believed to be dead, he secretly relocated the Ohara scholars' books to Elbaph and became a history teacher. He later emerges as a key ally of the Straw Hat Pirates in the Elbaph Arc.
Jaguar D. Saul.Appearance: Saul is a giant with a large, muscular build. He has a long, flowing beard and wears a simple outfit consisting of a white shirt and pants. He is often seen carrying a large axe.
Jaguar D. Saul.Personality: Saul is a kind-hearted and gentle giant who values friendship and knowledge. He is known for his strong sense of justice and willingness to protect those he cares about, even at the cost of his own safety. Despite his size and strength, he is gentle and compassionate.

Abilities.Giant Strength: Saul possesses immense physical strength, capable of lifting and throwing large objects with ease.
Abilities.Combat Experience: He has extensive combat experience and is skilled in using his giant axe in battle.
Abilities.Intimidation: His sheer size and presence can intimidate opponents, giving him an advantage in combat.

Koby.name: Koby
Koby.Description: Koby the Hero is a Marine Captain and member of the special forces unit SWORD, known for his rapid rise from a cabin boy to a key figure within the Marines. Trained under Garp, he gained fame after the Rocky Port Incident and was later captured by the Blackbeard Pirates before escaping. Once an early ally of Luffy, Koby has appeared as both a friend and brief adversary across several arcs, including Romance Dawn, Post-Enies Lobby, and Marineford.
Koby.Affiliations: Marines ( SWORD ), Marine 153rd Branch (former); Alvida Pirates (defected)
Koby.Occupations: Marine Captain; Master Chief Petty Officer (promoted), Chore Boy (promoted); Pirate Ship Caretaker (former)
Koby.Appearance: Koby has grown thinner and taller, standing close to Luffy in height. He has also gained a cross-shaped scar above his right eye, presumably earned under Garp's heavy-handed tutelage. His hair has grown longer and shaggier since his growth spurt, but it has retained its kobi pink color.
Koby.Personality: Koby is a determined and hardworking individual who aspires to become a Marine hero. He is kind-hearted, compassionate, and values justice. Despite his initial timid nature, he has grown more confident and assertive over time, especially under Garp's training.

Abilities.Haki Mastery: Koby has shown proficiency in both Kenbunshoku Haki and Busoshoku Haki, allowing him to sense opponents and enhance his attacks.
Abilities.Combat Training: Under Garp's tutelage, Koby has received extensive combat training, improving his physical abilities and combat skills.
Abilities.Leadership: As a Marine Captain, Koby has demonstrated leadership qualities and the ability to command his subordinates effectively.

Tashigi.name: Tashigi
Tashigi.Description: Captain Tashigi is a Marine officer and the captain of G-5's Unit 01, serving directly under Vice Admiral Smoker. First introduced in Loguetown, she steadily rose through the ranks and is known for her strong sense of justice. Though initially an antagonist, she later cooperates with the Straw Hats during the Arabasta and Punk Hazard arcs.
Tashigi.Affiliations: Marines; G-5 Unit 01; Loguetown Marine Base (former)
Tashigi.Occupations: Captain; Ensign (former); Master Chief Petty Officer (former)
Tashigi.Appearance: Tashigi has dark brown eyes and wears her black hair between chin- and shoulder-length. She looks remarkably similar to the late Kuina, Zoro's childhood friend. She wears rectangular glasses with red frames.
Tashigi.Personality: Tashigi is a determined and principled Marine officer who values justice and the law. She is known for her strong sense of duty and her desire to protect the innocent. Despite her serious demeanor, she has a compassionate side and often shows concern for others.

Abilities.Swordsmanship: Tashigi is a skilled swordswoman, capable of wielding multiple swords with great proficiency.
Abilities.Haki Mastery: She possesses advanced Observation Haki, allowing her to sense the presence and emotions of others.
Abilities.Combat Training: Tashigi has received extensive combat training as a Marine officer, improving her physical abilities and combat skills.

Donquixote Rosinante.name: Corazon
Donquixote Rosinante.Description: Donquixote Rosinante, also known as Corazon, was a former Celestial Dragon and Marine Commander who went undercover within the Donquixote Pirates. Despite posing as a loyal officer to his brother Doflamingo, he worked secretly to protect Trafalgar Law, ultimately sacrificing his life to save him. His tragic death became a key motivator for Law’s quest for revenge.
Donquixote Rosinante.Occupations: Marine Commander; Pirate Elite Officer (undercover); World Noble (former)
Donquixote Rosinante.Appearance: Rosinante was a tall man (standing just below his brother at 293 cm); in adulthood, he was a comparable height to his older brother Doflamingo (who stands 305 cm). He had short shaggy golden-blonde hair, pale skin (tanner in the manga, much like his brother), and sharp, reddish-brown eyes. He wore a dark red hood from which two heart-like shapes hang, a pair of beige jeans (white in the anime), a very dark-purple feather mantle much like his brother, and a white shirt with pink hearts printed all over it.
Donquixote Rosinante.Personality: Rosinante was a kind-hearted and selfless individual who cared deeply for others, especially his adoptive brother Trafalgar D. Water Law. He was willing to sacrifice himself to protect Law and ensure his safety, even at the cost of his own life. Despite his tragic past, Rosinante maintained a positive outlook and a strong sense of justice.

Abilities.Calm-Calm Fruit: Rosinante's Devil Fruit allowed him to nullify all sound in his vicinity, rendering him effectively mute and invisible to others.
Abilities.Swordsmanship: He was a skilled swordsman, capable of using his sword with great proficiency.
Abilities.Haki Mastery: Rosinante possessed advanced Observation Haki, allowing him to sense the presence and emotions of others.
Abilities.Combat Experience: He had extensive combat experience as a Marine officer and was skilled in hand-to-hand combat.

X Drake.name: Dory
X Drake.Description: Red Flag X Drake is the captain of the Marine secret unit SWORD and a former rear admiral who went undercover as a pirate by founding the Drake Pirates. A member of the Worst Generation, he infiltrated the Beasts Pirates as one of the Tobiroppo before ultimately revealing his true allegiance and joining the alliance against Kaidou.
X Drake.Affiliations: Marines ( SWORD ); Drake Pirates; Beasts Pirates ( Tobiroppo , former); Barrels Pirates (defected); Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (disbanded)
X Drake.Occupations: Captain of SWORD; Pirate (undercover); Captain (undercover); Shinuchi (undercover, former); Marine Rear Admiral (former)

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Allosaurus

X Drake.Appearance: Drake is a tall, lean, and muscular man who wears what appears to be a combination of a white-plumed cocked hat with his crew's Jolly Roger on the side and a domino mask over his eyes. Underneath this headgear, Drake's hair is reddish brown, with brush-like sideburns. On his broad chin he has an x shaped scar, and on his chest and upper body he also has another large X.
X Drake.Personality: Drake is a serious and determined individual who values strength and justice. He is known for his stoic demeanor and unwavering resolve, often prioritizing his duties as a Marine over personal desires. Despite his tough exterior, he has a strong sense of honor and loyalty to his allies.

Abilities.Dragon-Dragon Fruit, Model: Allosaurus: Drake's Devil Fruit allows him to transform into an Allosaurus, granting him immense strength, speed, and durability.
Abilities.Swordsmanship: He is a skilled swordsman, capable of using his sword with great proficiency.
Abilities.Haki Mastery: Drake possesses advanced Observation Haki, allowing him to sense the presence and emotions of others.
Abilities.Combat Experience: He has extensive combat experience as a Marine officer and is skilled in hand-to-hand combat.
